Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I found while GenAI could provide some general feedback, often it didn't align with the specific teachings of the course (e.g. the details of certain theories or processes we were expected to follow) and so I typically did not take that feedback on. Feedback from teachers has always been in line with the expectations and teachings of the course, so I've found this is easier to apply.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher's feedback is typically less specific and more general. GenAI feedback is usually quite specific but can be inaccurate.
